actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to establish an economic zone contiguous to the territorial sea of the United States.

summary.text: Establishes an economic zone to extend 197 miles seaward from the outer limits of the territorial sea. Provides for equitable reimbursement to the United States for operations associated with nonrecoverable resource recovery which are carried out by any foreign citizen or entity within the economic zone.

titles.title: A bill to establish an economic zone contiguous to the territorial sea of the United States.
